def_cn: 越野比赛(如赛跑、自行车赛、滑雪赛等)
def_en: Cross-country is the sport of running, riding, or skiing across open countryside rather than along roads or around a running track.

def_cn: 横越全国的;遍及全国的
def_en: A cross-country journey involves less important roads or railway lines, or takes you from one side of a country to the other.
